title: cant launch game
body: I rolled back my Windows a few updates a few days ago because the latest windows ten updates destroyed being able to play games, but now when i press launch in the launcher it disappears and nothing happens, im repairing the files now but if anyone knows anything about this id appreciate the help

replies.body:
It's possible that your administrative privileges could have been stripped from League. League requires certain permissions in order to run, so I recommend checking out our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League is set up with these.

Let me know if you still see the issue.
